channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Scratchpad

item.title: About
item.description: Dmitry Shkolnik Data Scientist at Destination Canada where I specialize in analysis and modelling to better understand the behaviour of international visitors to Canada. Sometimes I get to make pretty things too. I try to support open-source and open data where possible. I enjoy learning and using new tools whenever the opportunity presents itself, but I work primarily in R. In fact, this entire website was constructed in Rmarkdown using blogdown and Hugo.
